response.original_title: How to UnMake a Bully, Volume 9 : Exploding Hormones!
response.overview: An unknown mutation spreads, causing kids to behave irrationally and to experience thoughts, feelings and changes they never had before. Scientists accidentally release their mutation test subject into an unsuspecting high school, where other teens experience work stress, relationship problems, and bullying.
response.title: How to UnMake a Bully, Volume 9 : Exploding Hormones!
